com.myscript.atk.itc

Class SmartPageGestureAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.myscript.atk.itc.SmartPageGestureAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISmartPageGestureListener

    public class SmartPageGestureAdapter
extends Object
implements ISmartPageGestureListener
    Convenience class to extend when you want to listen to a subset of all gestures.

    • Method Detail

      • insertGesture

        public void insertGesture(SmartPage smartPage,
                 List<SmartStroke> gestureStrokes,
                 float x,
                 SmartWord nearestWord,
                 int charIndex)
        Description copied from interface: ISmartPageGestureListener
        Notifies that an insert gesture has been detected.
        Specified by:
        insertGesture in interface ISmartPageGestureListener
        Parameters:
        smartPage - the page in which the gesture has been detected
        gestureStrokes - the stroke generating the gesture detection (not anymore in the page when gesture default default processing is disabled)
        x - the abscissa of the return gesture
        nearestWord - the nearest word to the gesture abscissa
        charIndex - the character index next to the gesture in the writing direction

                    float x,
                    float y)
        Description copied from interface: ISmartPageGestureListener
        Notifies that an single tap gesture has been detected.
        Specified by:
        singleTapGesture in interface ISmartPageGestureListener
        Parameters:
        smartPage - the page in which the gesture has been detected
        gestureStrokes - the stroke generating the gesture detection (not anymore in the page when gesture default default processing is disabled)
        x - the abscissa coordinate of the gesture
        y - the ordinate coordinate of the gesture
